punches.message: Thanks for coming in! Your first scan reward is coming in a text!
That was your second scan! Just three more visits and we'd like to buy you dessert!
You're more than halfway to a special reward…
Next visit it'll be our pleasure to treat you to dessert with your meal!
Yay! 5 checkins means you get a free dessert! Check your texts.
Six scans down, four to go. You're working your way to a 10% discount…
Three more visits and we'll treat you to a 10% discount off your order.
What's your thing? Ribs? Brisket? Two more visits and it's all 10% off!
Nice work! Next visit you'll win 10% off an entire order!
Thanks for being an Albert G's fan! You've earned 10% off your bill. Check your texts
Keep coming back, it just keeps getting better! Four more visits and you get a 15% discount!
Welcome back! That's 12 visits! Only three more and we'll take 15% off your order!
Lucky 13th visit! Only two more…
Thanks for coming back! Next time you'll get 15% off your entire check!
You are awesome! Check your texts for a deal worth 15% off an entire order!
You're a BBQ legend! 4 more visits earns you a 20% discount off your entire bill.
Getting closer...3 more visits and we'll treat you to a 20% discount off your order.
Oh you're so close.  2 more visits = 20% off!
You've almost reached Pitmaster status! Next visit gets you a 20% discount off your bill.
Wow! This is your 20th visit since we've been counting! Check your texts for a 20% off deal.
Blackjack! 21 check-ins! Working your way to a 25% discount…
Great to see you again! Keep coming back, the biggest reward is coming up!
So close! 3 more visits to a 25% discount!
Yeehaw! Next visit you're a big winner!
You did it! 25 visits means you get 25% off! Check your texts.
Fantastic! That's 26 visits, and we really appreciate you. Next one, let's start over!
